akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 116–6, div. G, title II, § 236, Feb. 15, 2019, 133 Stat. 467

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1437f–1. Repealed. Pub. L. 116–6, div. G, title II, § 236, Feb. 15, 2019, 133 Stat. 467
Section, Pub. L. 113–235, div. K, title II, § 221, Dec. 16, 2014, 128 Stat. 2754, related to report on section 8 project-based housing.
Provisions similar to those in this section were contained in the following prior act:
Pub. L. 113–76, div. L, title II, § 225, Jan. 17, 2014, 128 Stat. 632.
